errors.error_description: Changed Python version requirements to include Python 2.7 which is outdated and incompatible with current Pastas
correction_candidates: To install Pastas, a working version of Python 3.9, 3.10, 3.11, or 3.12 has to be installed on your computer.
To install Pastas, a working version of Python 3.8 or higher has to be installed on your computer.
To install Pastas, a working version of Python 3.7+ has to be installed on your computer.
To install Pastas, a working version of Python 3.6 or newer has to be installed on your computer.
errors.golden_answer: To install Pastas, a working version of Python 3.9, 3.10, 3.11, or 3.12 has to be installed on your computer.
